summary: At Bed DRS, we have a new approach to selling Mattresses.  Bed DRS strives to help consumers improve their health by getting a better night's sleep.  We offer state of the art pressure mapping and digital imaging to capture correct spinal alignment plus a Dream Room where they can try their favorite mattress for up to 4 hours in a private room with TV, games, music and a sound machine.NewSleep, is an on-line mattress e-commerce business that is being funded through the Arizona Equity Crowd Funding platform FundMyBusinessAZ.com.  We will compete directly with Casper and Tuft & Needle, but our approach will be different.  Our marketing  handle is that people deserve a choice of comfort for their mattresses and several price points. Most competitors offer just one mattress and price that is supposed to be for everyone.
name: Wes Harrington
title: CEO Bed DRS USA, LLC and CEO NewSleep LLC
